recommended_action:
1. Follow the documentation and create a new network suitable for your requirements.
2. Follow the documentation and delete the default network
rationale: The default network has automatically created firewall rules and has pre-fabricated network configuration. Based on your security and networking requirements, you should create your network and delete the default network.

not.errorMessage: Default GCP network should not be in use.

name.errorMessage: Default GCP network should not be in use.
